name: Blue Plate Special Sewing Pattern
description:
This item is available as an instant download!

Order up!  Blue Plate Special is here!

Have a seat and check out our menu!  Today we are serving up meatloaf and mashed potatoes, spaghetti and garlic bread, cheeseburgers and steak fries and today's special-grilled cheese and tomato soup!  Thirsty?  You can wash it down with some ice cold milk or a strawberry shake!  If you want to skip straight to dessert, you can have a banana split with a cherry on top!

Composed of all the items listed above, this pattern ebook also contains patterns and instructions for a plate and custom menu.  Printed at home on your color printer, you can print custom menus on printable fabric so your customers can order all the food you sew up!

Perfect for girls or boys, this versatile pattern is sure to please!

Completed menu size-8.5"x10.5"

*After confirmed payment, you will receive an email from Big Cartel with download instructions.

*Sweetie Pie Bakery patterns are for personal use only.

*This listing is for the PATTERN only, not the finished product.

name: Felt Campfire Cookout Pattern
description:
This product is available for instant download!

This is a fun set for girls or boys to enjoy! You can have endless hours of campfire fun outdoors or inside on a rainy day!

With this pattern, you can create a 3D campfire, hot dogs with slots to roast them, buns, graham crackers, chocolate squares, melted marshmallows, whole marshmallows with slots to roast, and toasted marshmallows with roasting slots!

Final Dimensions:
Completed Campfire-Approximately 11"h x 17"w

8 instructional pages with 14 images, 7 pattern pages with
*step-by-step* illustrations!

Please convo for any questions or special requests! Thanks for looking!

**After confirmed payment has been received, an email will be sent from Big Cartel with download information.

**This listing is for the PATTERN only! Pattern is copyright protected and not intended for resale. This pattern is for personal use only.

name: Felt Picinic Basket Lunch Pattern
description:
This is a fully illustrated ebook with step-by-step instructions and illustrations!

Summer is perfect weather for a picnic! Whether it's an indoor picnic on a rainy day, or in the back yard on a quilt, your little ones can enjoy packing up a lunch and having a pretend picnic!

The picnic basket is displayed with a lining but is designed to be made without and still just as beautiful! The lid hinges in the back and there is a button and loop closure to keep the contents secure.


This pattern set will include a material list, pattern pieces and detailed instructions for creating:
~Picnic Basket

~Submarine Sandwich
-bun
-deli meat
-cheddar cheese
-swiss cheese
-lettuce
-tomatoes

~Potato Chips with Bag

~Chocolate Chip Cookies


**After confirmed payment has been received, an email will be sent from Big Cartel with product download information.

**This listing is for the PATTERN only! Pattern is copyright protected and not intended for resale. This pattern is for personal use only.

name: Felt Cupcake and Muffin Baking Set Pattern
description:
This product is available for instant download!

This set is a great start to your felt food collection. With the patterns included, your little one can bake and decorate their own muffins and cupcakes! Having the the tools to prep the muffins and cupcakes, bake, then decorate, there is plenty to keep them busy!

Complete with this pattern, you will receive full color, illustrated instructions to create a muffin pan, mixing bowl, baking mix, wooden spoon and pot holders! With all of these tools, your little ones can bake up delicious muffins (banana, carrot, and blueberry) as well as cupcakes (chocolate, vanilla butter cream topped with a strawberry and pink frosted)

Sweetie Pie Bakery Patterns are all constructed in a drafting software to allow professional results, each time. Some patterns call for limited sewing machine use, but the majority of construction is done by hand sewing, lending to that cute edge finish that you see in all of the finished products! Feel free to use wool or craft felts with these patterns.

Final Dimensions:

Muffin Tin-8" x 8"

Muffins/Cupcakes-measure 3" diameter on top

18 instructional pages with step-by-step illustrations, 9 pattern pages



**After confirmed payment has been received, an email will be sent from Big Cartel with instant download information.

**This listing is for the PATTERN only! Pattern is copyright protected and not intended for resale. This pattern is for personal use only.

name: Felt Cookbook and Baking Set Pattern
description:
This product is available for instant download!

This pattern is sure to please any little baker!

Now your little one can take out their very own cookbook and whip up something yummy!

This set comes complete with a felt cookbook with printable recipe pages, canisters with flour, sugar and brown sugar and measuring cups. Also included are the patterns and instructions for all of the treats including: macaroons, caramel-fudge brownie, cinnamon roll, cheesecake, peanut butter cookies and cherry pie!

This e-book has 21 pages of fully illustrated, step-by-step instructions and 39 pattern pages to be printed from your home computer.

After receipt of confirmed payment, an email will be sent from Big Cartel with download information.

*This purchase is for the PATTERN only.

*Patterns are copyright protected and intended for personal use only. No commercial use of this product is allowed.
